system.description: Effect: The user sets their HP to 0 and Faints. After the user Faints, the Target gains 8 Ticks of HP and 4 Ticks of PP. If the user is an owned Pokemon and their Trainer has another Pokemon that is not Fainted in a Poke Ball, that Pokemon may be designated the target of this Attack.

actions.name: Healing Wish
actions.description: Effect: The user sets their HP to 0 and Faints. After the user Faints, the Target gains 8 Ticks of HP and 4 Ticks of PP. If the user is an owned Pokemon and their Trainer has another Pokemon that is not Fainted in a Poke Ball, that Pokemon may be designated the target of this Attack.
